description:
Haven for Happiness
This beautifully presented three bedroom, two bathroom home with double garage is fully equipped with all you need as a perfect investment or first home.
The property is 2 years young and soaked in natural light, the design process has not missed a beat with neutral colours, with stylish flooring, stainless steel appliances and central second bathroom.
The spacious master bedroom is situated at the front of the property with split system and includes ensuite with walk in robe.
Additional features include carpet & built in robes in all bedrooms, ample storage, split system in lounge, a great North facing entertaining area with exposed aggregate at the rear ready for you to enjoy all day sunshine and make it your own.
Conveniently located in the Whytesands Estate, close to the North facing stunning Red Rocks Beach and a short stroll into central Cowes.
Currently a successful permanent rental, enquire now to see what rental return you could achieve.
Don't wait, inspect now!

Lakefront living at its best!!
Perfectly positioned overlooking the lake, trees and parkland this quality home is perfect for permanent or holiday living. Featuring three generous bedrooms with built in robes, ensuite to master and central second bathroom.
A large, light filled open plan living area with gas fired log heater and soaring ceilings make a great place to relax. For those that like to cook you will be very happy with the kitchen that features stone benches, large oven and plenty of storage.
Entertaining will be a breeze with a huge roof top deck and built in barbeque.
Comfort year round is provided via two split system units and cosy Hydronic Heating systems. To complete the picture low maintenance rear yard and gardens, double remote garage and all being walking distance to the beach and main street.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

The right choice in the Seagrove Estate!
This superb allotment, located within easy walking distance to the beaches, shops, doctors, primary schools and restaurants in Cowes is an opportunity not to miss.
With the title anticipated for February 2020, you will have plenty of time to prepare your dream home on this 513sqm approx. parcel of land.
All home sites in the Final release feature an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water and super-fast optic-fibre connections to the National Broadband Network.
Offering the ultimate lifestyle in the Seagrove Estate, this property could be enjoyed for the purpose of permanent or holiday living. To find out more get in touch with us today!

Contemporary Townhouse Overlooking The Greens
This quality built home is located in a prime location opposite the golf course, and walking distance into town, schools, shopping and the beach.
Carefully designed with appeal and functionality in mind, the floor plan features both the master bedroom, with ensuite and walk in robe and the kitchen, living, dining all on the ground level, making this perfect for retirees. Currently used as a permanent home, it would also be ideal for holiday living or investment.
The well-appointed kitchen features a large walk in pantry, stone benchtops, and quality appliances. A bright and spacious living area leads out to undercover outdoor entertaining and fully fenced rear yard with views across to the golf course. There is also a separate laundry, powder room and internal access to the double garage.
Upstairs there are 2 further bedrooms and a family bathroom to complete the home.
The contemporary design and decor is complimented with high ceilings, neutral colour scheme and generous room sizing.
Securely located within the Birch Crescent complex, you also have access to a fully maintained swimming pool and tennis court facilities, it ticks so many boxes!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

The perfect package in Cowes
Located in a quiet court very close to the beach is this fantastic townhouse. Featuring north facing, main open plan living areas flowing onto a large sunny deck. It is the perfect entertainer.
Three good sized bedrooms; the master with ensuite, two bathrooms in total and three toilets. There is also a second living area upstairs great for the kids, a double garage and all only minutes walk to the beach, boat ramp, cafe and local park.
Inspect by appointment only.

Island Living In Seagrove
Situated in the popular Seagrove Estate, this well designed and functional 4 bedroom home is conveniently located within easy walking distance to the Cowes beach and Thompson Avenue, making it sought after for both permanent and holiday living.
This brick single level home is well positioned on the large fully fenced 664sqm corner allotment, to allow side access - perfect for caravan or boat storage!
The practical floorplan offers 2 generous living areas, with central open plan hostess kitchen - ideal for the entertainers, and a large undercover outdoor pergola area for that ideal mix of indoor and outdoor living.
There are 4 generous bedrooms, with the master suite complete with ensuite and walk in robe, and the remaining rooms all featuring built in robes and ceiling fans. A family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the home.
Boasting ducted central heating, split system cooling and ceiling fans to all bedrooms, this residence is well equipped to provide comfort in all seasons. There is also a double garage with internal access, and a handy garden shed.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Perfect Getaway
The perfect getaway awaits, with excellent access to all Cowes has to offer. The added bonus of low maintenance and secure car parking. With so many options, there is potential for holiday income or just enjoy and use at your own leisure.

Create Your Own Lifestyle
Located in one of Phillip Islands most thriving suburbs, Cowes, is a rare chance to secure this fantastic 576 sqm (approx) fenced allotment with potential for water glimpses from a second level.
The property has underground power, water, recycled water and sewerage available to the boundary and optic-fibre connections to the National Broadband Network and is within walking distance of the pristine Cowes Beach.
This is a perfect opportunity to enjoy the Island lifestyle by securing your very own vacant allotment in a family friendly area.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Love At First Sight
This newly renovated, 5-bedroom home located in the ever-popular Cowes area is ready for its new owners to move right in and start enjoying the island lifestyle. With a modern, stylish interior and classically aesthetic exterior, 57 Teddy Bear Lane has it all.
The character filled property features five generously sized bedrooms, one of which could be utilised as a second living zone, the beautifully designed open plan living/kitchen/dining area complete with brand new cabinetry and stainless-steel appliances, the main elegant bathroom and laundry.
Out through the stacking doors at the rear of the home is the fully covered entertaining decking, overlooking the nature/recreation reserve - ideal for family gatherings.
Other features include; full ensuite to the master bedroom, timber benchtops throughout, built in robes in three of the bedrooms, single car garage and ample additional parking, 900ml electric oven and gas cooktop, wine fridge, split system heating and cooling, stunning polished timber floorboards, carpet and tiles, access to adjoining recreation reserve and much more.
Positioned on a 629sqm approx. fully fenced allotment, with low maintenance surrounds, this home is sure to impress.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Phillip Island.

Timeless appeal
Located in the well-known Northern Shores Estate, this home is centrally located close to parks, playgrounds and only a short stroll to the Cowes Beach, Anderson boat ramp and Cowes General Store.
Comprising two spacious living zones, four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Additional features include manicured gardens, tiles throughout, undercover alfresco dining, two split system heating/cooling and double garage.
This beautifully appointed and well-maintained home has been built to accommodate the whole family with ease. All of this is set within 660sqm approx. fully fenced allotment. There is currently a great tenancy in place managed through Ray White Phillip Island.
This property is an ideal permanent family residence or investment opportunity.
This property for Sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Everything you need!
Appealing to those who are looking for a beautifully presented, low maintenance home in the family friendly Whytesands Estate! This well-maintained single level residence is near new and offers a relaxed lifestyle for those looking to move in permanently or simply use as a weekender.
Comprising of two spacious living areas, three robed bedrooms, two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe, ensuite and access to the undercover rear entertainment deck.
The well-appointed kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, including a large 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, butler's pantry with sink.
Other great features include split system heating and cooling, double garage, undercover alfresco area and an additional outdoor decking with an adjustable shade cloth.
Positioned on a corner allotment of 443 sqm (approx), this fully fenced property offers lovely established surrounds and demands inspection.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Plan your new beginning
Located in the newly established Shoalhaven estate, this 415sqm (approx) block is your chance to create your forever home, holiday house or investment property. Titled and ready for your new build design.
In a private location, this block will not last long. Minutes' walk to Justice Road beach and parklands, a few minutes drive to Cowes centre and endless opportunity.
Enquire now!

Looking To Extend Your Investment Portfolio?
Only a short drive to the popular Red Rocks Road Beach and to Cowes is this single level property situated in a quiet and established area.
Comprising a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, sunroom/rumpus area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms and laundry. The kitchen and bathrooms have been recently refurbished.
With other great features including split system heating and cooling, dishwasher, stainless steel cooking, timber floors to the main living space and garden sheds.
All of this is set within a 653sqm approx. allotment and currently has a permanent tenancy in place.
Inspections are by private appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

You Found It!
This immaculately presented double storey home in the popular Shearwater Estate in Cowes, really is the complete package!
Situated on a large 739sqm approx. corner allotment, the site and home have been carefully designed to incorporate ample space for entertaining, living, sheds and storage.
The home itself, contemporary in design, offers all the essentials on the ground floor. With master suite, boasting ensuite and walk in robe, open plan living, kitchen, dining area, separate laundry and toilet and internal access to the double garage.
Upstairs, you will be delighted to find another spacious living area, featuring an inbuilt bar - and outdoor decking, a further 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, and a family bathroom.
Both levels offer split system heating and cooling and ceiling fans for year round comfort.
You will be amazed by the outside entertaining space, with a large undercover area featuring an outdoor fire place and 6 seater spa bath. This area will impress the keenest of entertainers.
The 7.5m x 9m carport with extra height (4 metres) is perfect for accommodating a large boat, caravan or both! And a further 7.5 x 4m shed - creating the ideal workshop or man cave - you will be the envy of all your mates!
In this sought after location, close to the golf course, and a short stroll into town and the beach, this property would suit either permanent or holiday living, it could be the sea change you have been looking for!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Central Cowes With Boat Storage!
This 3 bedroom home is situated in a quiet street, centrally located and within walking distance of Thompson Avenue, and the Cowes foreshore.
Positioned on a corner block of 663sqm approx, it could hold potential for subdivision (STCA).
With ample storage space for caravan or boat, with a large garage, with electric roller door and extra height, as well as another single garage - perfect for a workshop.
Inside this neat as a pin home, you will find kitchen, living dining space, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, separate laundry, with internal access into the workshop and garage space.
The home has been well equipped to handle all the elements, with a new cozy slow combustion heater in the main living area, and split system heating and cooling.
Ideal for permanent or holiday living, or as an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

OPEN HOME CANCELLED
Positioned in the heart of Cowes and situated on a 644sqm approx. fenced allotment. This desirable property is ideal for a first home buyer, holiday home, an investment property or an opportunity to renovate/extend or rebuild (S.T.C.A) - leaving you with endless possibilities.
This retro besser brick with original 1960's features, comprises of an open plan living/kitchen and dining area with large windows allowing lots of natural light and featuring exposed beams.
Inside are two bedrooms with polished floors, bathroom, separate shower, toilet and laundry.
The third bedroom (or potential sunroom/study/office) has a separate entry and a freestanding bungalow providing a fourth bedroom.
An additional bungalow could be restored as a second living area with kitchen and ensuite, or used as a workroom, storage area or man cave!
All of this is within proximity to the local primary schools, doctors, shops/cafes and everything Cowes has to offer.
Set on a fully fenced, low maintenance garden and driveway, inbuilt storage and tool shed, water tank, fruit trees.
With scope to enhance and a highly sought-after location, inspection is a must.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

PRIVATE CORNER ALLOTMENT WALK TO COWES CENTRAL
This is a neat and tidy well presented 3 bedroom home.
Currently in the process of being subdivided (Planning permit Issued) the current owners are offering the large corner allotment and 3 bedroom home situated on 351m2 for sale.
As you enter the home you are greeted with a central living space with split system for year around comfort, and a large country kitchen with big bench spaces and pantry. Three large double bedrooms are located at opposite end of the home and a newly renovated bathroom. A great entry level for new home buyers or purchase and secure a long term tenant.
Call The Team at Alex Scott to arrange a private viewing

THE IDEAL CORNER BLOCK
This allotment of approx. 672m2 is in the ideal location with side frontage looking over the beautiful Shearwater Lake.
Titled land and ready to build a new home and take advantage of the North East aspect over the lake
The Shearwater Estate, is a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate.
Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the heath lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction.
Call today to secure your land for your future.

Quiet Cowes Location, Walk To The Beach!
This quaint 3 bedroom home is perfectly located in quiet street in central Cowes, with an easy stroll into Thompson Avenue, to access caf√©'s, restaurants, supermarkets and amenities, or to the popular north facing Cowes beach.
Perfectly suited to holiday living, permanent living or investment, the home offers a spacious living/kitchen/ dining area, 3 generous sized bedrooms (master complete with ensuite and WIR), family bathroom and separate laundry. Split system heating and cooling, and a slow combustion fire have been installed for year-round comfort.
Outside you have the option of a shady front verandah (complete with water glimpse) or undercover pergola, ideal for those summer barbies! With plenty of space for parking on this 602sqm approx allotment, the property could easily accommodate for the caravan, boat and cars.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Great Block, Great Position
Located in the prestigious Seagrove Estate and close to Cowes North facing beaches. This corner allotment is situated opposite the Seaberry Creek Park and it's scenic lake. Boasting a North Easterly aspect, it is ideally positioned to obtain the best energy efficiency possible.
The 470 square metre block (approx.) is surrounded by quality built homes. Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this. Located only 700 metres to Cowes boat ramp and Kiosk and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Call today to enquire.

Great Value Beach House!
Located close to beautiful Red Rocks beach is this quaint home with a great holiday feel to it. The home comprises a central open plan kitchen, dining and living area, three good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom combined laundry including a bath with a shower over. A sliding door from the living area opens onto the north facing balcony which is a perfect place to relax after a day at the beach. This great value property boasts a spacious yard offering plenty of potential to extend the home at your leisure. It would make an ideal holiday home in this fabulous location.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling and a dishwasher
